--- create_search_index_simple.sql
-- no optional clauses
CREATE SEARCH INDEX AlbumsIndex
  ON Albums(AlbumTitle_Tokens)
--- AST
&ast.CreateSearchIndex{
  Create: 23,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 43,
    NameEnd: 54,
    Name:    "AlbumsIndex",
  },
  TableName: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 60,
    NameEnd: 66,
    Name:    "Albums",
  },
  TokenListPart: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 67,
      NameEnd: 84,
      Name:    "AlbumTitle_Tokens",
    },
  },
  Rparen:           84,
  Storing:          (*ast.Storing)(nil),
  PartitionColumns: []*ast.Ident(nil),
  OrderBy:          (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
  Where:            (*ast.Where)(nil),
  Interleave:       (*ast.InterleaveIn)(nil),
  Options:          (*ast.Options)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE SEARCH INDEX AlbumsIndex ON Albums(AlbumTitle_Tokens)
